name: uaip-backend
description: Unified Agent Intelligence Platform Backend Services

scripts.clean: pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build.json --clean && pnpm exec tsc -b tsconfig.build_shared.json --clean
scripts.dev: concurrently  "pnpm dev:agent" "pnpm dev:sec" "pnpm dev:cap" "pnpm dev:art-ser" "pnpm dev:orch-pipe"
scripts.dev:agent: SERVICE_NAME=agent-intelligence cd services/agent-intelligence && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:sec: SERVICE_NAME=security-gateway cd services/security-gateway && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:cap: SERVICE_NAME=capability-registry cd services/capability-registry && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:art-ser: SERVICE_NAME=artifact-service cd services/artifact-service && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:orch-pipe: SERVICE_NAME=orchestration-pipeline cd services/orchestration-pipeline && pnpm run dev
